channel.title: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!
channel.description:
Hey, Uhm Im new in the server bussiness, Uhmm but I know how to handle servers. The thing is, that with any source I use, I cant change anything. The reason of this I think is the Compiler, lets take Player Rights for example. When I try changing the player rights of any player, I change the "0" to a "2". And I save the Notepad. After that I try logging in the account, and the account is either reseted, or not an administrator. Now this happens with everything, I mean I try to change commands and all kind of things, and after I try doing that, I compile. Once I compile it shows some errors, Here I will post A picture of what it says, Please Help.
Thank you for your help Aeolian. I've Fixed it.. ;) I would Rep++ you But I don't seem to have 15 Reputation myself. Anyways Thank you. :3
[img]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii136/Carlosdelgado123/Compilererrors.jpg[/img]

item.title: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!
item.dc:creator: @Ambriosa1 Ambriosa1
item.description:
@Ambriosa1 wrote:

So what you are telling me is that, I cant use a dot in any part of the source? Let’s say I change a text when I teleport, does it mean that I can’t end the sentence with a Dot, " . " ?

Example: You have just reached a level of 99 Strength.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!

item.title: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

This Means " ^ " That There is a unexpected error in your source,

Which it is point at is a " . " = Dot,

Remove the dot and your problems are solved.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!

So what you’re telling me is, that I Should just find the " ^ " Mark inside the Source’s folders and just delete it?

item.title: 508 Compiler Need Help as fast as Possible.! :( [[FIXED]] EASY!
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

Sorry for the miss undercuse,

You have a UN-Expected Error In Your Complier.

Alright look at your complier , Complie it, It Should Have Something Like This “^”

That is the Error You need too remove that you put in your source.

Read full topic
